00028 #include <stdint.h>
00029 #include <stddef.h>
00030 
00031 #include <string.h>
00032 #include <stdio.h>
00033 #include <stdlib.h>
00034 #include <time.h>
00035 
00036 #include "qspy.h"
00037 #include "hal.h"
00038 #include "getopt.h"
00039 
00040 //............................................................................
00041 #define FNAME_SIZE 256
00042 #define BUF_SIZE   1024
00043 
00044 enum TargetLink {
00045     NO_LINK,
00046     FILE_LINK,
00047     SERIAL_LINK,
00048     TCP_LINK
00049 };
00050 
00051 //............................................................................
00052 int main(int argc, char *argv[]) {
00053     int optChar;
00054     char comPort[FNAME_SIZE];
00055     char inpFileName[FNAME_SIZE];
00056     char outFileName[FNAME_SIZE];
00057     char savFileName[FNAME_SIZE];
00058     char matFileName[FNAME_SIZE];
00059     TargetLink link = NO_LINK;
00060                                               // default configuration options
00061     strcpy(inpFileName, "qs.bin");
00062     strcpy(comPort, "COM1");
00063     int tcpPort          = 6601;
00064     int baudRate         = 38400;
00065     uint8_t quiet        = 0;
00066     uint8_t tstampSize   = 4;
00067     uint8_t objPtrSize   = 4;
00068     uint8_t funPtrSize   = 4;
00069     uint8_t sigSize      = 1;
00070     uint8_t evtSize      = 2;
00071     uint8_t queueCtrSize = 1;
00072     uint8_t poolCtrSize  = 2;
00073     uint8_t poolBlkSize  = 2;
00074     uint8_t tevtCtrSize  = 2;
00075     outFileName[0]       = '\0';                  // Output file not specified
00076     savFileName[0]       = '\0';                    // Save file not specified
00077     matFileName[0]       = '\0';                  // Matlab file not specified
00078 
00079     time_t now = time(NULL);
00080     printf("QSPY host application %s\n"
00081            "Copyright (c) Quantum Leaps, LLC.\n"
00082            "%s\n", QSPY_VER, ctime(&now));
00083 
00084     static char const help[] =
00085         "Syntax is: qspy [options]          * = default\n\n"
00086         "OPTION                    DEFAULT  COMMENT\n"
00087         "----------------------------------------------------------------\n"
00088         "-h                                 help (this message)\n"
00089         "-q                                 quiet mode (no stdout output)\n"
00090         "-o<File_name>                      produce output to a file\n"
00091         "-s<File_name>                      save the binary data to a file\n"
00092         "-m<File_name>                      produce a Matlab file\n"
00093         "-c<COM_port>  *           COM1     com port input\n"
00094         "-b<Baud_rate>             38400    baud rate selection\n"
00095         "-f<File_name>             qs.bin   file input\n"
00096         "-t                                 TCP/IP input\n"
00097         "-p<TCP_Port_number>       6601     TCP/IP server port\n"
00098         "-T<tstamp_size>           4        QS timestamp size (bytes)\n"
00099         "-O<pointer_size>          4        object pointer size (bytes)\n"
00100         "-F<pointer_size>          4        function pointer size (bytes)\n"
00101         "-S<signal_size>           1        signal size (bytes)\n"
00102         "-E<event_size>            2        event size size (bytes)\n"
00103         "-Q<queue_counter_size>    1        queue counter size (bytes)\n"
00104         "-P<pool_counter_size>     2        pool counter size (bytes)\n"
00105         "-B<pool_blocksize_size>   2        pool blocksize size (bytes)\n"
00106         "-C<QTimeEvt_counter_size> 2        QTimeEvt counter size\n";
00107 
00108     while ((optChar = getopt(argc, argv,
00109                              "hqo:s:m:c:b:tp:f:T:O:F:S:E:Q:P:B:C:")) != -1)
00110     {
00111         switch (optChar) {
00112             case 'q': {                                          // quiet mode
00113                 quiet = 1;
00114                 break;
00115             }
00116             case 'o': {                                         // file output
00117                 strncpy(outFileName, optarg, sizeof(outFileName));
00118                 printf("-o %s\n", outFileName);
00119                 break;
00120             }
00121             case 's': {                          // save binary data to a file
00122                 strncpy(savFileName, optarg, sizeof(savFileName));
00123                 printf("-s %s\n", savFileName);
00124                 break;
00125             }
00126             case 'm': {                                  // Matlab file output
00127                 strncpy(matFileName, optarg, sizeof(matFileName));
00128                 printf("-m %s\n", matFileName);
00129                 break;
00130             }
00131             case 'c': {                                            // COM port
00132                 if ((link != NO_LINK) && (link != SERIAL_LINK)) {
00133                     printf("The -c option is incompatible with -p/-f\n");
00134                     return -1;                                      // failure
00135                 }
00136                 strncpy(comPort, optarg, sizeof(comPort));
00137                 printf("-c %s\n", comPort);
00138                 link = SERIAL_LINK;
00139                 break;
00140             }
00141             case 'b': {                                           // baud rate
00142                 if ((link != NO_LINK) && (link != SERIAL_LINK)) {
00143                     printf("The -b option is incompatible with -p/-f\n");
00144                     return -1;                                      // failure
00145                 }
00146                 if (sscanf(optarg, "%d", &baudRate) != 1) {
00147                     printf("incorrect baud rate: %s\n", optarg);
00148                     return -1;                                      // failure
00149                 }
00150                 printf("-b %d\n", baudRate);
00151                 link = SERIAL_LINK;
00152                 break;
00153             }
00154             case 'f': {                                          // File input
00155                 if (link != NO_LINK) {
00156                     printf("The -f option is incompatible with -c/-b/-p\n");
00157                     return -1;                                      // failure
00158                 }
00159                 strncpy(inpFileName, optarg, sizeof(inpFileName));
00160                 printf("-f %s\n", inpFileName);
00161                 link = FILE_LINK;
00162                 break;
00163             }
00164             case 't': {                                        // TCP/IP input
00165                 if ((link != NO_LINK) && (link != TCP_LINK)) {
00166                     printf("The -t option is incompatible with -c/-b/-f\n");
00167                     return -1;
00168                 }
00169                 printf("-t\n");
00170                 link = TCP_LINK;
00171                 break;
00172             }
00173             case 'p': {                                         // TCP/IP port
00174                 if ((link != NO_LINK) && (link != TCP_LINK)) {
00175                     printf("The -p option is incompatible with -c/-b/-f\n");
00176                     return -1;
00177                 }
00178                 tcpPort = (int)strtoul(optarg, NULL, 10);
00179                 printf("-p %d\n", tcpPort);
00180                 link = TCP_LINK;
00181                 break;
00182             }
00183             case 'T': {                                      // timestamp size
00184                 tstampSize = (uint8_t)strtoul(optarg, 0, 10);
00185                 break;
00186             }
00187             case 'F': {                               // function pointer size
00188                 funPtrSize = (uint8_t)strtoul(optarg, 0, 10);
00189                 break;
00190             }
00191             case 'O': {                                 // object pointer size
00192                 objPtrSize = (uint8_t)strtoul(optarg, 0, 10);
00193                 break;
00194             }
00195             case 'S': {                                         // signal size
00196                 sigSize = (uint8_t)strtoul(optarg, 0, 10);
00197                 break;
00198             }
00199             case 'E': {                                         // event size
00200                 evtSize = (uint8_t)strtoul(optarg, 0, 10);
00201                 break;
00202             }
00203             case 'Q': {                                  // Queue counter size
00204                 queueCtrSize = (uint8_t)strtoul(optarg, 0, 10);
00205                 break;
00206             }
00207             case 'P': {                            // Memory-pool counter size
00208                 poolCtrSize = (uint8_t)strtoul(optarg, 0, 10);
00209                 break;
00210             }
00211             case 'B': {                          // Memory-pool blocksize size
00212                 poolBlkSize = (uint8_t)strtoul(optarg, 0, 10);
00213                 break;
00214             }
00215             case 'C': {                             // Time event counter size
00216                 tevtCtrSize = (uint8_t)strtoul(optarg, 0, 10);
00217                 break;
00218             }
00219             case 'h':                                                  // help
00220             default: {                                       // unknown option
00221                 printf(help);
00222                 return -1;                                     // error return
00223             }
00224         }
00225     }
00226     if (argc != optind) {
00227         printf(help);
00228         return -1;
00229     }
00230 
00231     // configure the Quantum Spy
00232     FILE *outFile = (outFileName[0] != '\0'
00233                      ? fopen(outFileName, "w")
00234                      : (FILE *)0);
00235     FILE *matFile = (matFileName[0] != '\0'
00236                      ? fopen(matFileName, "w")
00237                      : (FILE*)0);
00238     FILE *savFile = (savFileName[0] != '\0'
00239                      ? fopen(savFileName, "wb")     // open for writing binary
00240                      : (FILE*)0);
00241     qsConfig(quiet,
00242              objPtrSize,
00243              funPtrSize,
00244              tstampSize,
00245              sigSize,
00246              evtSize,
00247              queueCtrSize,
00248              poolCtrSize,
00249              poolBlkSize,
00250              tevtCtrSize,
00251              outFile,
00252              matFile);
00253 
00254     static unsigned char buf[BUF_SIZE];
00255     int n;
00256 
00257     switch (link) {
00258         case NO_LINK:                            // intentionally fall through
00259         case SERIAL_LINK: {           // input trace data from the serial port
00260             if (!comOpen(comPort, baudRate)) {
00261                 return -1;
00262             }
00263             else {
00264                 printf("\nSerial port %s opened, hit any key to quit...\n\n",
00265                        comPort);
00266             }
00267             while ((n = comRead(buf, sizeof(buf))) != -1) {
00268                 if (n > 0) {
00269                     qsParse(buf, n);
00270                     if (savFile != (FILE *)0) {
00271                         fwrite(buf, 1, n, savFile);
00272                     }
00273                 }
00274             }
00275             comClose();
00276             break;
00277         }
00278         case FILE_LINK: {                      // input trace data from a file
00279             FILE *f = fopen(inpFileName, "rb");     // open for reading binary
00280             if (f == (FILE *)0) {
00281                 printf("file %s not found\n", inpFileName);
00282                 return -1;
00283             }
00284             do {
00285                 n = fread(buf, 1, sizeof(buf), f);
00286                 qsParse(buf, n);
00287             } while (n == sizeof(buf));
00288 
00289             fclose(f);
00290             break;
00291         }
00292         case TCP_LINK: {                 // input trace data from the TCP port
00293             if (!tcpOpen(tcpPort)) {
00294                 return -1;
00295             }
00296             else {
00297                 printf("\nTCP/IP port %d opened, "
00298                        "hit any key to quit...\n"
00299                        "(the target must be stopped)\n",
00300                        tcpPort);
00301             }
00302             while ((n = tcpRead(buf, sizeof(buf))) != -1) {
00303                 if (n > 0) {
00304                     qsParse(buf, n);
00305                     if (savFile != (FILE *)0) {
00306                         fwrite(buf, 1, n, savFile);
00307                     }
00308                 }
00309             }
00310             tcpClose();
00311             break;
00312         }
00313     }
00314     if (savFile != (FILE *)0) {
00315         fclose(savFile);
00316     }
00317     if (matFile != (FILE *)0) {
00318         fclose(matFile);
00319     }
00320 
00321     printf("\nDone.\n");
00322     return 0;                                                       // success
00323 }
